jobs.description: Building security platforms that protect thousands of repositories across enterprise clients, owning product roadmap and stakeholder delivery.
Led the company post-CTO role; built automation systems that eliminated manual workflows and cut ops overhead by 90%.
Scaled the product catalog from 40 to 120 live products in 3 months; redesigned infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines for 75% faster releases.
Independent consultancy delivering full-stack and DevSecOps solutions for clients across Europe and the US.
Delivered web applications across three companies using Laravel, Vue.js, and React; collaborated on large-scale telecom projects at Orange.
Provided technical support and incident resolution for enterprise clients, developing strong diagnostics and communication skills.
